feed.title: Neviere di Sicilia
feed.subtitle: Qesto progetto si pone l'obiettivo di censire le neviere siciliane e nasce da un'idea di Luigi Romana, cultore, studioso, storico ed esperto di tutto ciò che riguarda la gelateria, e di Nino Galante, mappatore digitale ed anch'egli appassionato di storia della gelateria e della pasticceria, siciliana in particolare.

entry.title: Welcome to Jekyll!
entry.content:
You’ll find this post in your _posts directory - edit this post and re-build (or run with the -w switch) to see your changes! To add new posts, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention: YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext.

Jekyll also offers powerful support for code snippets:

Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll’s GitHub repo.
entry.summary: You’ll find this post in your _posts directory - edit this post and re-build (or run with the -w switch) to see your changes! To add new posts, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention: YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext.
